comment.author: 28860935@N02
comment._content: the lighting in this photo is just perfect... it gives me chills it like i am there. i really get a feeling like i am the one taking the photo.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in a feature article on the 1906 wool clip which was published in the Sydney Mail on 17/10/1906 (this issue isn't on Google News Archive...it's on microfilm though)...the SM had evidently visited Bringagee, Groongal and Toganmain stations in the Riverina...it appears likely that this and the accompanying pics were taken at one/all of these locations. The Sydney Mail caption was 'Skirting the fleeces, rolling, and classing' - Also see: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363516180/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2533272578/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2533273722/
